column4: In need to disable Immediate-Configure in apt.conf but unable to find where is apt.conf?
Getting errors while apt-get and also a message to see Immediate-Configure. man page says to try with disabling this option
configs are in /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/
In which file to disapble this
I don't have any apt.conf in /etc/apt/apt.conf.d
just create a new file and add your option, if none of the existing files have the option already set
what is the format?
read "man apt.conf"
ok
once added into apt.conf how to activate this settings?
I still get error while apt-get and it says to look for Immediate-Configure in man 5 apt.conf
In man page it says to disable it which I did by Get{Immediate-Configure "false"}
they'll be read when apt runs
but I still get error
isn't it " APT::Immediate-Confifure "false" "
Configure*
I have tried this: $sudo apt-get -o APT::Get::Immediate-Configure="false" dist-upgrade
but I still get errors. No effect observed.
try       -o APT::Immediate-Configure="false"
afaik "Immediate-Configure" is an own group like GET
Still no effect observed and get same error
no idea then, sorry
Actually by mistake I deleted /var/lib/dpkg directory
